longBusinessSummary: Dwarikesh Sugar Industries Limited engages in the manufacture and sale of sugar and ethanol in India and internationally. It is also involved in the co-generation of power; manufacture of industrial alcohol and ethanol; and production of hand sanitizers. The company was formerly known as Dwarka Sugar Limited and changed its name to Dwarikesh Sugar Industries Limited in April 1994. Dwarikesh Sugar Industries Limited was incorporated in 1993 and is based in Mumbai, India.
